TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AutoGeneratedField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField
Public NotInheritable Class AutoGeneratedField Inherits BoundField
public ref class AutoGeneratedField sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::BoundField

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件中自动生成的字段。

span.span: Represents an automatically generated field in a data-bound control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示数据绑定控件中自动生成的字段，例如 或 。The class is used to represent an automatically generated field in a data-bound control, such as or . 当适当的属性设置为 `true` (例如， 控件的属性 、 控件的属性等 ) 时，数据绑定控件将创建自动生成的字段。Automatically generated fields are created by a data-bound control when the appropriate property is set to `true` (for example, the property for the control, the property for the control, and so on). > [!NOTE] > 自动生成的字段不会添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合中 (例如， 控件的集合 、控件的集合等等 ) 。Automatically generated fields are not added to the field collection of a data-bound control (for example, the collection for the control, the collection for the control, and so on). 类供数据绑定控件在内部使用。The class is intended for use internally by data-bound controls. 与其他数据字段不同 (如 、 、 等) ， 不能以声明方式将类放置在页上作为字段集合的一部分。Unlike other data fields (such as , , , and so on), the class cannot be placed declaratively on a page as part of a field collection. 尽管可以通过编程方式将 对象添加到字段集合中，但应避免使用此设计模式。Although you can programmatically add an object to a field collection, this design pattern should be avoided. 由于自动生成的字段表示自动呈现字段，因此数据绑定控件通常不允许用户修改对象的属性 。Because automatically generated fields represent the automatic rendering of a field, data-bound controls do not typically allow users to modify the properties of the objects. 如果自动呈现功能不适合您的需要，则为控件的字段集合定义您自己的数据字段。If the automatic rendering is not suitable for your needs, define your own data fields for the field collection of the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 派生自控件的自定义控件创建对象 。The following example demonstrates how to create an object for a custom control that derives from the control. [!code-csharp[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/CS/SimpleCustomControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/VB/SimpleCustomControl.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 此构造函数通常由数据绑定控件在 创建自动生成的字段时 (，如和) 。This constructor is generally used by data-bound controls (such as and ) when creating automatically generated fields. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在实现从控件派生的自定义控件时，使用此构造函数创建类的新实例 。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to create a new instance of the class when implementing a custom control that derives from the control. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在从数据源检索字段值时，是否将空字符串 ("") 值转换为 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string ("") values are converted to when the field values are retrieved from the data source.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，字段的值是数据源中 ( "" ) 的空字符串。Sometimes a field's value is an empty string ("") in the data source. 属性用于指示 `null` 在中显示空字符串值之前是否将这些值转换为 。The property is used to indicate whether empty string values are converted to `null` before being displayed in an . > [!NOTE] > 此版本的属性已实现为总是返回 `true` 。This version of the property has been implemented to always return `true`. 不能设置此属性。It is not possible to set this property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定 对象中每个图像的备用文本所呈现的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the format in which the alternate text for each image in an object is rendered.
Always returns an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于将特殊格式应用于对象中显示的值 。The property is used to apply a special format to the values displayed in an object. > [!NOTE] > 此版本的属性已实现为始终返回空字符串，以指示没有对字段值应用特殊格式设置。This version of the property has been implemented to always return an empty string to indicate that no special formatting is applied to the field values. 不能设置此属性。It is not possible to set this property.

summary.span: 获取或设置在 对象中显示的值的数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the data type of the values displayed in an object.

value.span: ，表示在 对象中显示的值的数据类型。

span.span: A that represents the data type of the value displayed in an object.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定对象中显示的值的数据类型 。Use the property to specify the data type of the values displayed in an object. 数据类型确定对象中呈现的控件类型 ，以显示值。The data type determines what type of control is rendered in an object to display the value. 例如，当类型为时，将显示一个复选框控件 。For example, a check box control is displayed when the type is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指定字段值的数据类型，以便在以编程方式 在从控件派生的自定义控件中创建对象时使用 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data type of the field values when programmatically creating an object in a custom control that derives from the control. [!code-csharp[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/CS/SimpleCustomControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AutoGenerateFieldProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoGenerateFieldProperties/VB/SimpleCustomControl.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 对象中的值填充指定的 对象。

span.span: Fills the specified object with the values from the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于从对象中的指定对象检索字段的值 。The method is a helper method used to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified object in an object. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 该方法没有返回值。This method does not have a return value. 相反，字段值通过 为参数传入的对象的引用返回 `dictionary` 。Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter. 调用方法后，循环访问 对象以访问字段值。After the method has been called, iterate through the object to access the field values. > [!NOTE] > 若要在对象中包含只读字段值 ，请 `true` 为 `includeReadOnly` 参数传入。To include the read-only field values in the object, pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 对象在插入模式中是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the object is visible in insert mode.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在支持 (例如控件) 插入记录的数据绑定控件中 ， 属性用于指定 当数据绑定控件处于插入模式时是否显示该对象。In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the control), the property is used to specify whether the object is displayed when the data-bound control is in insert mode. > [!NOTE] > 此版本的属性已实现为总是返回 `true` 。This version of the property has been implemented to always return `true`. 不能设置此属性。It is not possible to set this property.

summary.span: 确定 对象中所包含的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于确定包含在对象中的控件是否 支持回调。The method is the helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in an object support callbacks. 此方法已实现为空方法 (一个方法，该方法不包含任何代码) 以指示支持回调。This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. 从类派生的类 可以重写此方法，以指示字段包含的控件是否支持回调。Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks. 若要指示支持回调，请将此方法实现为空方法，该方法不会引发异常;否则，将引发异常，并提供有用的消息，说明不支持回调的原因。To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
